text.title: Australia | Latest News & Updates | BBC News
text.text: Australia | Latest News & Updates | BBC News Skip to content British Broadcasting Corporation Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Arts Travel Earth Audio Video Live Israel-Gaza War War in Ukraine US & Canada UK Africa Asia Australia Europe Latin America Middle East In Pictures BBC InDepth BBC Verify Home News Israel-Gaza War War in Ukraine US & Canada UK UK Politics England N. Ireland N. Ireland Politics Scotland Scotland Politics Wales Wales Politics Africa Asia China India Australia Europe Latin America Middle East In Pictures BBC InDepth BBC Verify Sport Business Executive Lounge Technology of Business Future of Business Innovation Technology Science & Health Artificial Intelligence AI v the Mind Culture Film & TV Music Art & Design Style Books Entertainment News Arts Arts in Motion Travel Destinations Africa Antarctica Asia Australia and Pacific Caribbean & Bermuda Central America Europe Middle East North America South America World’s Table Culture & Experiences Adventures The SpeciaList Earth Natural Wonders Weather & Science Climate Solutions Sustainable Business Green Living Audio Podcast Categories Radio Audio FAQs Video BBC Maestro Live Live News Live Sport Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Arts Travel Earth Audio Video Live Weather Newsletters News News Australia Meta starts kicking Australian children off Instagram and Facebook The tech giant will begin closing accounts for under 16s, a week before an official ban. 7 hrs ago Australia Relive day one of second Test as Root hits first Test century in Australia Reaction and the best clips following an enthralling opening day of the second Test in Brisbane. Husband and wife accused of using spycam and earpieces to win almost £600k at Australian casino The husband and wife are alleged to have used a range of devices - including earpieces - to cheat card games over a number of weeks. 4 days ago Australia The Wiggles issue statement after appearing in Ecstasy music video The popular Australian children's group says it "does not condone" drug use, after two of its members are shown dancing in a Keli Holiday video. 5 days ago Australia Melbourne ex-childcare worker charged with more child rape offences Alleged paedophile Joshua Dale Brown faces an extra 83 charges with four new victims identified. 10 hrs ago Australia YouTube says it will be less safe for kids under Australia's social media ban The Google-owned platform says parental controls will be stripped away as a result of the ban. 1 day ago Australia Australia won't be intimidated by firms over social media ban, minister tells BBC Anika Wells says she is ready to help nations which wish to copy Australia's social media ban for under-16s. 2 days ago Australia Features & Analysis Australia's beloved weather website got a makeover - and infuriated users Nicknamed the Bom, the country's weather agency has been heavily criticised over a recent redesign. Australia is banning social media for kids under 16. How will it work? The world-first law aims to reduce the risks children face online, but critics fear it may not work. Why this is England's worst defeat in Australia in years England missed a chance to turn fierce Ashes pressure on Australia with self-inflicted defeat in Perth, writes Stephan Shemilt. The Aussie giving War & Peace a 'bogan' remake Ander Louis has written a new version of Leo Tolstoy's classic Russian novel in Australian slang. 'Nestflix': Peregrine falcon livestream has Australians glued to their screens Fans of the birds, whose lives have been compared to Game of Thrones, are currently waiting with bated breath for this year's chicks to fledge. Watch/Listen Will Australia's social media ban actually work? Australia is banning social media for everyone under the age 16 - here's everything you need to know in 60 seconds. Climate protesters in kayaks disrupt operations at Australian port Dozens have been arrested during climate protests at one of the world's biggest coal export ports. Watch: Moment huge fireball destroys Sydney waste facility A large chemical tank was blown into the air by the inferno at North St Mary's in western Sydney, Australia. Watch: Three 'Nestflix' peregrine falcons each take flight for the first time Three peregrine falcon chicks, stars of the "Nestflix" livestream, have finally taken their first flights above the Melbourne city skyline. Watch: Australian windsurfer escapes shark attack Andy McDonald recalls moment he encountered a shark while windsurfing in Western Australia this week. Latest updates 7 hrs ago Meta starts kicking Australian children off Instagram and Facebook The tech giant will begin closing accounts for under 16s, a week before an official ban. 7 hrs ago 9 hrs ago Lyon out of home Test for first time since 2012 Nathan Lyon is left out of an Australia side for the first time in a home Test since 2012, while the hosts were also still without captain Pat Cummins for the second Ashes Test. 9 hrs ago 10 hrs ago Melbourne ex-childcare worker charged with more child rape offences Alleged paedophile Joshua Dale Brown faces an extra 83 charges with four new victims identified. 10 hrs ago 15 hrs ago Australia is banning social media for kids under 16. How will it work? The world-first law aims to reduce the risks children face online, but critics fear it may not work. 15 hrs ago 1 day ago YouTube says it will be less safe for kids under Australia's social media ban The Google-owned platform says parental controls will be stripped away as a result of the ban. 1 day ago 2 days ago Australia won't be intimidated by firms over social media ban, minister tells BBC Anika Wells says she is ready to help nations which wish to copy Australia's social media ban for under-16s. 2 days ago 3 days ago Will Australia's social media ban actually work? Australia is banning social media for everyone under the age 16 - here's everything you need to know in 60 seconds. 3 days ago 4 days ago Husband and wife accused of using spycam and earpieces to win almost £600k at Australian casino The husband and wife are alleged to have used a range of devices - including earpieces - to cheat card games over a number of weeks. 4 days ago 4 days ago Climate protesters in kayaks disrupt operations at Australian port Dozens have been arrested during climate protests at one of the world's biggest coal export ports. 4 days ago ...
